channel.title: Server IP
channel.description: I know I'm going to get punished like the small guy in the prison showers for asking this, but.. How do I change the IP of the server to work along with the client? :D

item.title: Server IP
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:6, topic:432806”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=535514.msg3915263#msg3915263 date=1329098035]
If you are attempting to use a client for a server that aren’t compatible, then the problem is the UID is not set correctly. The UID is the ID the server and client use to connect. If the client does not have the proper UID, the server blocks connection. Its sort of a way for servers to prevent cheat clients and what not.
[/quote]

And a horrible method yet.[/quote]A lot of java code is horrible, yet it works fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Server IP
item.dc:creator: @Doggie_Skill Doggie Skill
item.description:
@Doggie_Skill wrote:

If you want to change your Server Ip, use no-ip.com or wutevs its called.

If you want to change the ip in a client, its either in client.java or clientsettings.java

Read full topic
